sentences.sentence: "As I see it," I explained, "not only are most TV programs badly written and produced, but viewers are also manipulated by the mass media."
sentences.translation: “在我看来，”我解释道，“不仅大多数电视节目的编剧和制作都很糟糕，而且观众也受到大众媒体的操纵。”

sentences.sentence: Whenever in electioneeringa, this issue will become a manipulated tool for each political party.
sentences.translation: 每到政党竞选之时，族群问题就成为各政党争相操弄的选战工具。

sentences.sentence: He manipulated the matter very well.
sentences.translation: 他把问题处理得非常好。
